categories: Category:Office of Peace and Security officers

nodes.text: Gruunelda was a female Trandoshan, who lived on Cularin during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

Gruunelda was a sergeant in the Office of Peace and Security, Cularin's law enforcement agency. She liked to wear lipstick and on occasion, she would purchase bootleg Trandoshan music from S&N Music. In her spare time, she also liked to visit the bar Lover's Kiss, in Hedrett.

When Senator Lavina Wren and Jarid DeBell announced that they were going to get married, the Heroes of Cularin were sent to investigate a plot to stop the wedding. They asked Gruunelda a few questions about the plot.
